content: Did I miss something? Has something changed with regards to connecting to Military.com? I used to have this as a "favorite" and when I clicked on it I went directly to Military.com's Home Page. Now I get a whole Google page of selections. Maybe I need to change something on my connecting end ??? I'm a baby-boomer so I am not that computer literate ... I'm still trying to figure out how to program my VCR

content: Several things have changed (see the profile page), but most likely you hadn't logged in for some time and had to relog in! Failing that, log in, go to the page you want as a default for mil.com, then highlight the URL, Ctrl-C to copy it, go to Manage your Bookmarks, find the mil.com bookmark, and change the URL on that Bookmark! It is not our belief or disbelief that can make or unmake the fact. ~ Thomas Paine

content: I have a VCR I used it I have tapes from country music singers. when I looked at the tapes tried to play them but I forgot how to put them in. OH BOY the kid downstairs taught me. He also taught my to hear CD's on my computer. I'm old and confused with the new fangled stuff. My great grandson age 6 is better than I am,
